sqlMap.select: select count(user_id) from vs_admin where user_name=#userName# and pwd=#pwd#
select user_id,user_name,pwd,user_email,add_time,last_login_time, removed_time,user_state,last_login_ip from vs_admin where user_id=#userId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into vs_admin(user_id,user_name,pwd,user_email,add_time,last_login_time,removed_time,user_state,last_login_ip) values ((select LPAD(max(CAST(tvs.user_id as SIGNED)+1),3,'0') from vs_admin tvs),#userName#,#pwd#,#userEmail#,#addTime#,#lastLoginTime#,#removedTime#,#userState#,#lastLoginIp#)
sqlMap.update: update from vs_admin set user_name=#userName#,pwd=#pwd#,user_email=#userEmail#,add_time=#addTime#, last_login_time=#lastLoginTime#,user_state=#userState#,last_login_ip=#lastLoginIp# where user_id = #userId#
sqlMap.delete: update from vs_admin set removed_time=#removedTime# where user_id = #userId#
